name: Waldos Revenge
description:
Hey everyone! This is my first game. I started messing with Unity seriously a couple weeks ago. After watching some videos on the game-jams, I decided to challenge myself to actually make a full game this weekend. Instead of "putzing" around trying to build things that are beyond my current abilities. So here it is. I would love to hear feedback on this. And now, on to the game.

In the Style of "Where's Waldo" you are assigned a target to find in the crowd,, and  shoot them. Why?  Who cares.

You start with 30 seconds. Every "assigned" target you kill, gives you an additional 5 seconds. Every person you shoot that isn't your target has a penalty of 5 seconds. Meaning, you lose 5 seconds.  The more targets you kill the harder it gets. Can you make it to the end?  

This was a hoot to make, and my brother threw down with trying his hand at pixel art. (He did a great job!) 

CONTROLS:

Fire: Left Mouse or Left Conrtrol

Menu: Esc or M
